00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP

00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 #include "../argument_caster.hpp"

00029 #include <boost/assign.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/filesystem/operations.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/asio/ip/address_v4.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/asio/ip/address_v6.hpp>
00033 
00036 namespace clpp {
00037 
00040 namespace detail {
00041 
00042 using namespace boost::assign;
00043 
00044 void check_ipv4_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00045     try {
00046         boost::asio::ip::address_v4 a( boost::asio::ip::address_v4::from_string( address ) );
00047     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00048         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00049                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00050                                           + " has invalid IPv4 value '" + address + "'!";
00051         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void check_ipv6_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00056     try {
00057         boost::asio::ip::address_v6 a( boost::asio::ip::address_v6::from_string( address ) );
00058     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00059         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00060                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00061                                           + " has invalid IPv6 value '" + address + "'!";
00062         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void check_ip_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00067     try {
00068         check_ipv4_validity( address, parameter_name );
00069     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00070         try {
00071             check_ipv6_validity( address, parameter_name );
00072         } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00073             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00074                                               + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00075                                               + " has invalid value '" + address + "' (not IPv4, not IPv6)!";
00076             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00077         }
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void check_path_existence( const std::string& path, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00082     if ( !boost::filesystem::exists( path ) ) {
00083         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00084                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00085                                           + " has invalid path value '" + path + "' (no such path)!";
00086         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00087     } else {}
00088 }
00089 
00090 void check_email_validity( const std::string& email, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00091     const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00092                                       + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'"
00093                                       + " has invalid e-mail value '" + email + "'!";
00094     if ( !boost::contains( email, "@" ) || !boost::contains( email, "." ) ) {
00095         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00096     } else {}
00097     
00098     const size_t at_quantity = size_t( std::count( email.begin(), email.end(), '@' ) );
00099     if ( at_quantity > 1 ) {
00100         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00101     } else {}
00102 
00103     const size_t at_position        = email.find_first_of( '@' );
00104     const size_t last_dot_position  = email.find_last_of( '.' );
00105     const size_t last_char_position = email.size() - 1;
00106     if ( 0 == at_position 
00107          || last_char_position == last_dot_position 
00108          || ( last_dot_position - at_position ) == 1
00109          || at_position > last_dot_position ) {
00110         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened ); 
00111     } else {}
00112 }
00113 
00114 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00115 
00120 class values_semantic_checker : public checker {
00121     typedef boost::function< void ( const std::string& /* arg */
00122                                     , const std::string& /* parameter name */ ) >
00123             check_func;
00124 
00125     typedef std::map
00126                 < 
00127                     const value_semantic
00128                     , const check_func
00129                 >
00130             checkers;
00131 public:
00132     values_semantic_checker( const parameters&                  registered_parameters
00133                              , const parameter_parts_extractor& extractor
00134                              , const std::string&               name_value_separator ) :
00135             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {
00136         insert( semantic_checkers )( path,  check_path_existence )
00137                                    ( ipv4,  check_ipv4_validity )
00138                                    ( ipv6,  check_ipv6_validity )
00139                                    ( ip,    check_ip_validity )
00140                                    ( email, check_email_validity )
00141                                    ;
00142     }
00143 private:
00144     checkers semantic_checkers;
00145     argument_caster caster;
00146 public:
00147     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00148         str_storage all_names = collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters(); 
00149         check_semantic_of_inputed_values( inputed_parameters, all_names );
00150         check_semantic_of_default_values( all_names ); 
00151     }
00152 private:
00153     str_storage collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters() const {
00154         str_storage all_names;
00155         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00156             all_names += registered_parameter.short_name;
00157         }
00158         return all_names;
00159     }
00160     
00161     void check_semantic_of_inputed_values( const str_storage& inputed_parameters
00162                                            , str_storage& all_names ) const {
00163         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00164             if ( this_is_parameter_with_value( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00165                 const std::string name  = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00166                 const std::string value = extractor.extract_value_from( inputed_parameter );
00167                 parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00168                                                    , registered_parameters.end()
00169                                                    , name );
00170                 if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00171                     check_semantic_of_inputed_value( *it, value );
00172                     delete_element( all_names, name );
00173                 } else {}
00174             } else {}
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178     bool this_is_parameter_with_value( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00179         return boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator );
00180     }
00181     
00182     void check_semantic_of_inputed_value( const parameter& registered_parameter
00183                                           , const std::string& value ) const {
00184         const value_semantic semantic = registered_parameter.semantic;
00185         if ( no_semantic != semantic ) {
00186             const std::string name = registered_parameter.short_name;
00187             semantic_checkers.at( semantic )( value, name );
00188         } else {}
00189     }
00190 private:
00191     void check_semantic_of_default_values( const str_storage& all_names ) const {
00192         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00193             str_const_it it = std::find( all_names.begin()
00194                                          , all_names.end()
00195                                          , registered_parameter.short_name );
00196             if ( all_names.end() != it ) {
00197                 check_semantic_of_default_value( registered_parameter );    
00198             } else {}
00199         }
00200     }
00201 
00202     void check_semantic_of_default_value( const parameter& registered_parameter ) const {
00203         const value_semantic semantic = registered_parameter.semantic;
00204         if ( need_to_check_semantic( registered_parameter, semantic ) ) {
00205             s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( registered_parameter.for_arg );
00206             semantic_checkers.at( registered_parameter.semantic )( p->default_value, registered_parameter.short_name );
00207         } else {}
00208     }
00209 
00210     bool need_to_check_semantic( const parameter& registered_parameter
00211                                  , const value_semantic& semantic ) const {
00212         return registered_parameter.has_default_value() 
00213                && ( no_semantic != semantic )
00214                && caster.argument_must_be_string( registered_parameter )
00215                ;
00216     }
00217 };
00218 
00219 } // namespace detail
00220 } // namespace clpp

00222 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP
